content: अपहारक, --हारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} One who or that which takes away, steals, re moves, destroys, conceals &c. (usually in <ab>comp.</ab>); जालापहारिणः <ls>H. 1</ls>; परद्रव्य° plunderer, thief; परवित्त°; वागपहारकः <ls>Ms. 11. 51</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 210</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 255</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 88.</ls> --कः A robber, thief.
